casebody.data:
Matthew S. Lennon, Plaintiff,
v.
State of North Carolina; The North Carolina Department of Justice, Roy Cooper, in his official capacity as the Attorney General for the State of North Carolina; The North Carolina Department of Public Safety; and Frank L. Perry, in his official capacity as the Secretary of The North Carolina Department of Public Safety, Defendants. No. COA 15-1341 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 16, 2016

REVERSED AND REMANDED.
